findings.title: Centralization risk correlated to the active owner
findings.description: The smart contract owner has multiple 'Write Contract' privileges, posing a high centralization risk.

findings.title: Elevated impact on smart contract safety and security due to active smart contract owner privileges
findings.description: The Niimfer Marketplace's smart contract has an ACTIVE OWNERSHIP with multiple 'Write Contract' privileges, including AIRDROP, GRANT/REVOKE ROLE, SET FLOOR PRICE, SET SERVICE FEE, SET PURCHASE LIMIT, BURN, which poses a high centralization risk.
